## Render time
```{python}
import datetime
import os
import time
before = datetime.datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
print(f"Start: {before}")
sleep = os.environ.get("SLEEP", "0")
time.sleep(int(sleep))
after = datetime.datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
print(f"Slept for {sleep} until: {after}")
```
